summary: Grants you the power to turn NPC´s to vampires with all the traits and skills with it.
descriptionHtml:
Vampirism is not a disease.. It´s a blessing..


With this mod you can now alter your vampiric powers and turn normal npc´s into Vampires like yourself. And now in version 1.1 you can even make them into slaves ( aka Followers ). 

You can cast the spell on anyone you please but you can only have one potential follower at the same time ( just like vanilla follower system ). 

You can transform anyone really, your spoose, your companion, Delphine(mainquest) or perhaps Astrid from the dark brotherhood. You choose who you would like to pass your gift to. 

The Spell will be given to you once you reach vampire stage 2. ( you need to starve yourself for atleast 2 days)


This is my first mod, so any suggestions or advice is very much appreciated. And don´t forget to endorse if you like the mod :)
author: TheSkoomaKing
